headline: Buying Ubisoft Taught Me a Costly Lesson
summary: Ubisoft stock is down roughly 90% since the beginning of 2022.

headline: A Look At Take Two Interactive (TTWO) Valuation After Earnings Beat And Grand Theft Auto VI Updates
summary: Take-Two Interactive Software (TTWO) is back in focus after beating recent revenue and earnings forecasts, supported by upbeat commentary around Grand Theft Auto VI and higher analyst earnings estimates despite sector wide AI concerns. See our latest analysis for Take-Two Interactive Software. At a share price of $211.48, Take-Two’s recent 7 day share price return of 5.89% contrasts with a 90 day share price decline of 15.18%, while the 3 year total shareholder return of 81.22% points to...

headline: Is It Time To Reassess Take-Two Interactive Software (TTWO) After Recent Share Price Swings?
summary: If you are wondering whether Take-Two Interactive Software's current share price reflects its true worth, you are not alone. This article is built to help you make sense of the numbers without the noise. The stock closed at US$211.48, with a recent 5.9% gain over the last 7 days, set against a 13.0% decline over 30 days, a 15.9% decline year to date and a roughly flat 0.2% return over 1 year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 81.2% and 23.8% respectively. These mixed returns sit in...
